name: 4G LTE Network Switch - Speed Test & SIM Card Info
description: 4G LTE Switch allows you to switch to LTE only mode by allowing to open a hidden settings menu. It includes 4G Internet Speed Test, SIM card information, Phone Information and more. This app is very helpful if your device doesnt have 4G/LTE only mode in your phone settings.  Features:   Switch to 4g only network mode  Lock your phone in 4G/3G/2G stable network signal   Enable VoLTE on supported device  Advanced Network configurations   Check your Internet Speed Test  SIM card and Phone information  Open Notification Log  Open Battery, Wifi information and Usage statics   It also has an Internet Speed Test which will help you to test internet speed of wide range of mobile networks (2G, 3G, 4G, Wi-Fi, LTE), check connection status over the time. Perform an expert internet speed test with one click and get all the information about your connection.  It provides SIM Card information SIM card of your device and Phone information. It lets you quickly access information about your device sim cards, network status, device information and the data stored on the primary sim card.   Also, this app allows you to open other hidden settings like Notification Log, Battery information, Usage statics and Wifi information. It aims to be clean and simple to use and provides multitude of information.   The app is continuously updated with new features. So, stay up to date for new app releases.
